abstract: Trading volume in Herbalife put options — financial contracts that gain in value as a particular stock price declines — spiked late last week. Even for a volatile stock like Herbalife, it was enough to make some market experts take notice.
snippet: Trading volume in Herbalife put options — financial contracts that gain in value as a particular stock price declines — spiked late last week. Even for a volatile stock like Herbalife, it was enough to make some market experts take notice.
lead_paragraph: Last week, before a senator released letters that sent the shares of Herbalife into a tailspin, certain investors were positioning themselves to make money if the stock fell.

headline.main: A Spike in Options Trading Before Herbalife’s Stock Fell
